snippet: In the ethnically and racially rich suburb of St.-Denis, you can find fresh foods and bargains at the food market.
abstract: Elaine Sciolino Letter From Paris on the search for bargains and exotica in the ethnically and racially rich suburb of St-Denis; the merchants and the customers seem to have common goals of buying and selling food products and anticipating the pleasure that comes with cooking and eating a Sunday afternoon meal.
lead_paragraph: In the ethnically and racially rich suburb of St.-Denis, you can find fresh foods and bargains at the food market.

headline.seo: Sniff Deep in a Market Like No Other - Letter From Paris
headline.main: A Market Is a Cultural Bouquet Garni
headline.print_headline: A Market Is a Cultural Bouquet Garni
